price: Tunay na sa gayon ay talagang may maisasaalang-alang para sa sinumang natatakot [kay Allāh].
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَعِبۡرَةٗ لِّمَن يَخۡشَىٰٓ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: inna fī dhālika laʿib'ratan liman yakhshā
